statements: SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM player_leaderboard ORDER BY game_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboard WHERE game_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM player_leaderboard WHERE game_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboard ORDER BY game_score DESC, game_level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE game_level >= 5;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE game_level < 3 AND game_score > 100 ORDER BY game_level DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score, game_level FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE '%Alice%' OR player_name LIKE '%Bob%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE game_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY game_score DESC, game_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY game_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE game_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM leaderboard INNER JOIN game ON leaderboard.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT DISTINCT game_name FROM game;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY game_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_score > 100 ORDER BY game_score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM leaderboard l INNER JOIN game g ON l.game_score = g.game_id
SELECT MAX(game_score) AS highest_score FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM leaderboard l LEFT JOIN game g ON l.game_score = g.game_id
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players WHERE total_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_score FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT game_title, game_genre FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM players WHERE total_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_title, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, game_title, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score, COUNT(game_id) AS num_games FROM players LEFT JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id GROUP BY players.player_id HAVING num_games > 2;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'Action' ORDER BY game_release_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, score_value FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id JOIN games ON scores.game_id = games.game_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND game_name = 'Pac-Man';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM players;
SELECT AVG(score_value) AS average_score FROM scores;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_genre, game_release_date FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_name, score_value FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id WHERE score_value > 100 ORDER BY score_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, ranking_position FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id WHERE ranking_position <= 3 ORDER BY ranking_position;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score_date FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id WHERE score_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY score_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE genre='Action' ORDER BY game_name;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE score > 200;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, game_id, rank FROM rankings ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, achievement_name FROM players p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, rank FROM players p JOIN rankings r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE rank <= 3;
